attributes.additional_details: We are in great need of someone who can bring in proven tactics to control gangs and violent law breakers in our society.  William Bratton of The United States has this experience and proven track record of cutting back murders and crime gangs in the U.S.  We should not be so proud to insist that the applicant should be British only, and employ William Bratton for the position of Chief Commisioner.  It is essential that we introduce new ways of dealing with rioting etc.
